[`static var centered: ScrollTransitionConfiguration.Threshold`](/documentation/swiftui/scrolltransitionconfiguration/threshold/centered)The target view is centered within the container[`static let hidden: ScrollTransitionConfiguration.Threshold`](/documentation/swiftui/scrolltransitionconfiguration/threshold/hidden)[`static func visible(Double) -> ScrollTransitionConfiguration.Threshold`](/documentation/swiftui/scrolltransitionconfiguration/threshold/visible(_:))The target view is visible by the given amount, where zero is fully hidden, and one is fully visible.
